Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text:
Nice Ethiopian restaurant on the west part of Amsterdam.

We tried the signature combo plate which can be found to all Ethiopian ‚Ä¶

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Food is okay besides bloating for the next few days :) nothing special but a nice experience to try. I am not sure I would be recommending it though. The dishes are not diverse in consistency, you don't need much teeth to eat boiled pulses ‚Ä¶

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Very exclusively delicious! Cozy home atmosphere with cool African music, the stuff was very much welcoming and helpful with a choice of the food. The food was very yammy, I would reccomend it 100%... definitely great food experience!

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: A small, delightful and warm restaurant near of the center of amsterdam... delicious food with extra and peculiar species .. they brought us together a flatbread  that is called injera ... in reality we used the bread in order to "catch" our food.

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: The food was lovely here, very many flavours blended into one another accompanied by a lovely and tasty bread with an interesting consistency and funny appearance. I had 2 lentil dishes, they satisfied me and the nice ambiance and service ‚Ä¶

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: This was my first time to eat Ethiopian food and it was very delicious. My boyfriend and I ordered two portions. We were totally full and enjoyed it very much. Also the coconut bear was great! The waiter was very helpful and friendly. Highly recommended! :)

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: The food was average, the service pretty bad. The lady already got a bit mad because we hadn't made our choice when she came to ask. At the end, they pretended it was not possible to pay by card because the machine was not working today. ‚Ä¶

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Best Ethiopian food in Amsterdam! We already went to Addis Ababa on the Overtoom many times, and it never disappoints. Friendly people and delicious food.

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: A great place to go if you‚Äôre into food that has taste and that taste is delicious, which is a rare find in Amsterdam.

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: An ethopian restaurant with peaceful ambiance. The platter which they gave was too much for 1 person we ordered 2 plates as they serve 1 plate for each customer. The best part was coconut beer. Dont miss the desserts .

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: If you're hungry and want a full meal, you can't go wrong with this place. Very homely and amazing food. Tip : get the full platter that gets you a little bit of everything. Also, if you go with just one other person, you'll have quite a bit of food to get through ;)

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Very nice restaurant. Super friendly waiting staff, relaxing atmosphere and good pricing. Food was delicious. We had the Addis special and a beginning option. Both were very good. I especially want to mention the regular Ethiopian beer wich ‚Ä¶

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Absolutely lovely place. Had a plethora of delicious  foods, all tasted magnificent. Service was kind and warm, and the place has a cozy feeling to it. Also vegan options available.

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Delicious Ethiopian food. We had no problems getting everything without dairy, and because we gave them 24 hours notice, they made the injera bread gluten-free as well. Everything was *so* good! Very helpful server, too!

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Nice ambience,  helpful staff, chef came and explained the menu. Overall a pleasant experience!!

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Amazing Food and great service! They have awesome vegetarian dishes and I recommend the coconut beer which is served in a coconut cup ü••üå¥ 10/10 would do it again!

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Superb Ethiopian food for meat eaters, vegetarians and vegans a like. Order the special and you'll get all kinds of dishes served on pancakes with extra pancakes on the side. It's SO much food, so it's great for big eaters :) The staff is super friendly as well.

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Food was exceptional. We enjoyed the cozy dining environment and on top of that, the restaurant owners were very friendly and thoughtful:)

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Really tasty and diverse. One portion definitely fits two people though :) And coconut beer is delicious!

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Delicious food, very friendly staff, prices are affordable and setting is cozy. A new food adventure for foodies.

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: This place was simply amazing, and it was my favorite restaurant in all the places we tried in Amsterdam. The atmosphere is cozy and the owner is incredibly warm and even showed us how to eat the meal the traditional way. They have very generous portion sizes, so expect a lot of food!

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Delicious and good quality includes vegetarian and meat dishes.

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: We go there with my friends from Belgium they recived us warmly Excellent service and delicious Ethiopian cuisine. A must try for all. It offers a variety of vegan and meats that you will really love. The banana beer is amazing! Really very  good prices and wonderful service!Will definitely be back!

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Amazing food in a style I hadn't had before. Nice friendly people.

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Wow. Everything was delicious. Great service and communication. A must if in amsterdam

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Nice and welcoming staff. We tried the fish and vegetarian dishes. Every person chose a meal and they arranged it in one big plate. Very tasty and big quantity. Good to try!

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Great food with gluten free option.

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Really poor quality food. Even the sour pancakes weren't sour... which is essential for Ethiopian food. Our salad had sweet chilli sauce, which is not suppose to be there... All the food was soggy and there was no salt or spices. Very disappointed and never ordering again. Date night ruined!!!

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: For one the first Ethiopian restaurants in Amsterdam, they are still doing good.  But it had reduced in overall maintained nice restaurant to a bit old place. The food was still pretty good and friendly people so I wish them a good business so that they can keep it maintained and running.

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Preface: The lady who was working was very welcoming and friendly upon our arrival. I'm, of course, biased because I reside in Seattle where we have the 2nd largest Ethiopian population in the States. I have been enjoying (and cooking) this ‚Ä¶

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: African food was never this impressive:great platters to share full of colorful tasty food with lots of spices cooked to perfection. It is in the affordable price range. There is gluten free flatbreads if you call one day in advance.

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Fantastic warm welcome for our first foray into Ethopian food. Unpretentious atmosphere with the African Nations Cup playing in the background. Our host was happy to teach us snippets of Ethiopian language and culture. Portion sizes for the ‚Ä¶

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: The owners are great! If you want it to be full of spices, you need to make sure to request it. Their normal food is served to accommodate the Dutch palate, and the locals do not enjoy spicy food.

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Best place to eat homemade authentic Ethiopian food. Love the Mango and Coconut beer out of a coconut. Also the food is very rich and tasts amazing. Price is more than fair. Only thing is the service is a bit slow but I gess it's just how ‚Ä¶

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: I had a lovely meal with my girlfriend and two of her best friends who I was meeting for the first time. The food was among the best #Ethiopian food I have ever tasted, and I have enjoyed that cuisine already in dozens of cities in three ‚Ä¶

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Best authentic Ethiopian restaurant that I know of. Even brought someone who grew up in Ethiopia here and he loves the food too! Be sure to try out their coffee to - it's delicious!

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Very delicious food and very lovely staff! Thank you!

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Omg, such an hidden gem, just followed my nose and couldn't help myself trying this, amazing food and even I couldn't finish it üíö

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Loved the food and definitely recommend. Two points of improvement are: the bathroom definitely need to be updated and the lovely lady owner needs to learn how to pour a beer! This restaurant is a solid choice üëç

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Thumbs up for ethiopian food!

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: I m ethiopian and I m really really offended about what you sold me. I came here 3 days ago from Italy, I use to buy and made fresh injera whenever I want and I was exited about to Cook for my boyfriend Shiro, zighini and dorho....he went ‚Ä¶

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: An absolute hidden gem in Amsterdam! We tried to find somewhere to eat with cheap prices and were blown away with not only the prices, but the amazing service, culture, food and portions! Super friendly, wish we had time to go again!!

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: So so good, service, food, price.  We walked in as they were closing kitchen and owner took pity on my crew and cooked us an unbelievable great meal.  Thank you!

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Great food. We had a large pancake served on a big plate with many different kinds of meat and vegetables. They serve African beer and Ethiopian coffee.

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text:
Great! Amazing food, beer and atmosphere. Superb service!
We became in love with Ethiopian kitchen after eating there.

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text:
Super lekker! I am very enthusiastic about the food in Addis Ababa every time I go there.
I always feel really happy after eating there and I definitely recommend it.
And remember to eat with your hands ;)

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Not as hip as the neighbor but it's clear why only locals come eat here. It's delicious soul food! But beware the portions are more than you can handle haha

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Great food and lovely people!

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: My first experience with Ethopian food was in this place. I can't compare it in terms of authenticity. But the flavour and presentation was on point.

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Always looking forward to a good Ethiopean restaurant in a city where there are some, but this one was disappointing. Food was uninspiring and felt inauthentic. There are better options in Amsterdam, e.g. Walia Ibex

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: The owners are great! If you want it to be full of spices, you need to make sure to request it. Their normal food is served to accommodate the Dutch palate, and the locals do not enjoy spicy food.

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Good service, really good food and price

Name: Ethiopisch restaurant Addis Ababa
Review Text: Delicious and authentic Ethiopian kitchen with incredibly friendly staff. Always had a great experience dining there!
